title: Memorial Arts Charity Letter Carving workshops
content:
Just thought UK typophiles might like to know about the letter carving  
workshops run by the Memorial Arts Charity. I completed one of the five day  
courses in London recently. It was well run and informative and I want  
to support them by recommending them to anyone interested in such pursuits.

[http://www.memorialartscharity.org.uk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014113538/http:/www.memorialartscharity.org.uk/ "http://www.memorialartscharity.org.uk/")

I came away from the course with a new perspective and enthusiasm  
for letter carving, an idea for a new typeface, and some nice,  
albeit slightly wobbly, letters to put on the mantelpiece.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014113538im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lettercarve_3414.jpg)
author: Seb Lester

comments.content: Tasty. Too bad I'm way across the pond.
